data.text: @cjsnowdon @drraghibali Glad they listened to a proper medic as seems to be too many pseudo scientists telling people what to do.
@cjsnowdon @drraghibali He,s been a voice of reason
@Sidney1st @cjsnowdon @drraghibali I don’t think it was lefties or right wing people saying that in particular, just conspiracy nuts

@drraghibali @cjsnowdon How much evidence do we have that significant behaviour change happened and if it did how much difference did it make?  We reached over 200k cases per day in December after this so called behavioural change

@cjsnowdon Agreed there is something wrong but I don’t feel qualified as a non-mathematical epidemiologist to diagnose that properly but others should. As I said I think their projections would have been better if they’d taken more account of decreased severity as well as behaviour change.
@drraghibali And it wasn't just that Omicron was milder than they expected. Even when they modelled 20-30% severity, they were way off.

@drraghibali Watching your appearance, I think you were a bit too kind to the modellers. Behaviour change is part of it, but the number of infections wasn't far off what they expected. There was something wrong with the models.
@drraghibali @cjsnowdon Following @drraghibali has been a great help.
@cjsnowdon Thank you. Of course they took advice from others too and ‘advisers advise, ministers decide.’
